snippet: The small country may have “significantly’' misread the cost of fixing its troubled financial sector, the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development said.
lead_paragraph: The small country may have “significantly’' misread the cost of fixing its troubled financial sector, the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development said.

headline.seo: O.E.C.D. Warns Slovenia on Banking Crisis
headline.main: Slovenia Facing a Banking Crisis, Report Warns
